column5: Please inquire about pets.  10 mins to downtown, including Minute Maid Park and Toyota Center. 10 mins to Midtown. 15 mins to Montrose. 15-20 mins to NRG Stadium, Medical Center (including MD Anderson), and Rice Village.  Charming 3 bedroom 2 bath bungalow on a corner lot in the heart of the North Norhill district in Historic Heights, a community that dates back to the late 1800s.   Comcast 200 Mbps internet speeds w/ Cable TV package.  Prices for long term stays can be negotiated.
